description: Bishops on a 2n+1 X 2n+1 board (see Robinson paper for details).
references: R. W. Robinson, Counting arrangements of bishops, pp. 198-214 of Combinatorial Mathematics IV (Adelaide 1975), Lect. Notes Math., 560 (1976). [The sequence psi(2k+1).]
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 28 2006
